IndexClipper.Minkowski


Clipper.Minkowski


This unit contains the code needed to perform MinkowskiSum and MinkowskiDiff in functions similarly named and found in the Clipper Unit. This unit is unlikely to be directly useful to the library user.

See Also

Clipper, MinkowskiDiff, MinkowskiSum
